description:
Allows developers to use newgrounds API for their games

Features:

Conditions:
   -UserIsLoggedIn

Actions:
  - LoadNewgroundsAPI
  - PostScoreOnScoreBoard
  - UnlockMedal
  - LogInToNewGrounds
  - LogOutFromNewGrounds

StringExpressions:
  - GetPlayerName
  - GetDateTime
  - GetVersion
  - GetMedalList
  - GetScoreBoardList
  - GetScoreOnScoreBoard
name: NewgroundsAPI
shortDescription: Allows developers to use newgrounds API.

eventsFunctions.name: LoadNewgroundsAPI
eventsFunctions.sentence: Load Newgrounds API Using App ID _PARAM1_ and Encrypt Key _PARAM2_

parameters.description: App ID (You can find this in your newground game edit page)
parameters.name: AppId

parameters.description: Encrypt Key (You can find this in your newground game edit page)
parameters.name: EncryptKey

eventsFunctions.description: Post Score on Newgrounds (you can create scoreboards from the game edit page on newgrounds).
eventsFunctions.name: PostScoreOnScoreBoard
eventsFunctions.sentence: Post Score on Newgrounds using scoreboard ID _PARAM1_ with value _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Unlock a game Medal (you can create medals from the game edit page on newgrounds).
eventsFunctions.name: UnlockMedal
eventsFunctions.sentence: Unlock a Medal on Newgrounds using Medal ID _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Login to Newgrounds (A webpage popup will display).
eventsFunctions.name: LogInToNewGrounds
